title: Amy Acker & POI cast @ SDCC 2015 interview
author: AmyAckerFanGuyChannel
comment: I hope the show gets picked up by another network and continues on. It's one of the few programs I really look forward to each season, always well done and engaging with unpredictable twists and turns.

we live in a world where paint-by-numbers, procedural, cop/doctor/lawyer shows like ncis get 15+ seasons and creative, innovative, thrilling, quality shows like person of interest get cancelled, so much more potential and things to explore. but nope, stick with the 25 Law+Order shows or 100 CSI spinoffs u keep renewing. so frustrating. it’s like the only places that actually allow real creativity and uniqueness to thrive are either the hbo/showtime/cinemax/starz style channels and maybe one or two channels like FX or AMC.
